body_html:
Proposal: we add a string tf_version to VersionDef, and use it to hint when op kernels are missing. It could be either just TF_VERSION_STRING or the concatenation of that and tf_git_version.

@josh11b Thoughts or objections?
body_text:
Proposal: we add a string tf_version to VersionDef, and use it to hint when op kernels are missing.  It could be either just TF_VERSION_STRING or the concatenation of that and tf_git_version.
@josh11b Thoughts or objections?
body:
Proposal: we add a `string tf_version` to [`VersionDef`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/framework/versions.proto#L22), and use it to hint when op kernels are missing.  It could be either just `TF_VERSION_STRING` or the concatenation of that and `tf_git_version`.

@josh11b Thoughts or objections?
